nodes.text: Plastcrete was a construction material. When dry, foamcast was comparable to plastcrete in terms of strength and wearability.

In the new Star Wars canon, plastcrete was mentioned in the 2018 roleplaying supplement Fully Operational, which was released by Fantasy Flight Games as part of Star Wars: Age of Rebellion. The material originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it first appeared in Christopher M. Olson's article The Yard of Opportunity, which was published in the 1995 roleplaying magazine Star Wars Adventure Journal 8 as part of West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
